text: T - Mobile today announced that the BlackBerry Q10 will be added to its growing 4G LTE smartphone portfolio.  Beginning April 29th, business customers interested in registering for the BlackBerry Q10 can visit http : / / business. t - mobile.com / blackberry - q10.  Additional details, including availability and pricing, will be shared at a later date.  General consumers can expect the BlackBerry Q10 to become available later on in May.
title: T - Mobile BlackBerry Q10 Pre - Order Begins April 29th for Business Customers.
url: http : / / n4bb.com / mobile - blackberry - q10 - pre - order - begins - april - 29th - business - customers /
